name: HENTAI CLIMBING
description:
HENTAI CLIMBING is an exciting third-person acrobatic game. You have to take control of a beautiful anime girl and test your dexterity! Evaluate your every step, every jump, because any wrong action can be fatal. If you fall, you will have to start all over again.

Main Features


  • Simple and convenient operation, it all depends on your skills
  • High mountains
  • Relaxing music
  • And a cute anime girl!
